pageContext.claim: “So the Washington Post is running the Reagan Foundation, and RINO Paul Ryan is on the Board of Fox, which has been terrible. We will win anyway, even with the phony @FoxNews suppression polls (which have been seriously wrong for 5 years)!”
pageContext.analysis: The publisher of The Washington Post, Fred Ryan, also is chairman of the board of the Reagan Foundation in his personal capacity but the news organization has no role at the foundation. News and polling organizations do not publish fake polls or “suppression polls,” which in Trump’s parlance are polls that relay false information to demoralize and dissuade people from voting.
